thrasthawadaya parajaya kirime wadapiliwele awasan thathparaye di pawa eya kadakappal kirimata wideshiya balawega ha ek wunu atham deshiya kandayam mewara jiniwa kumanthranaye di da elesama el.ti.ti.ee nyaya pathrayata kriya kele yayi janamadhya ha prawruththi amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha oostreliyawe sita ‚Äòdinamina‚Äôta pawasiya.merata nidahas adhyapanaya, nidahas saukhya aadi siyalla bhukthi windimin dolar wenuwen mawu bima pawa dun ema deshiya kandayam jathyanthara balawegawalatath wada bhayanaka bawa hethema kiya.anathurakata lakwa oostreliyawe prathikara labana amathiwaraya, erata sita durakathanayen sambandha wemin eeye (23) sawasa me baw pawasiya.janadhipathithuman pramukha wathman aanduwa gatha wu wakawanuwa thula ella wu siyalu abhiyoga jayagath bawath enisa idiriye di da oonama abhiyogayak jaya ganna bawath ee mahatha pawasiya.lankiya ithihasaye dawanthama abhiyogayak wu el.ti.ti.ee thrasthawadaya mawubimen thuran kirime abhiyogaya sarthakawa jayagath rajya nayakayata ha rajayata an siyalu abhiyoga etharam dawantha abhiyoga nowanne yayi da enisa jiniwa yojanawa sammatha wima kisiseth ratata pasubasimak nowanne yayi da amathiwaraya pawasayi.jiniwa yojana nisa jathyantharaya idiriye danin nowatimata jathiyak lesa apa mawubima labu sabama jayagrahanaya bawath eda thrasthawadaya parajaya kirime wadapiliwele di jathyantharaya idiriye danin nowati preruda jathiyaka abhimanaya raka dun apa ratata an kisidu awasthawaka lokaya hamuwe pasu pasata yamata awashyathawak nowana bawath rambaukwalla mahatha wadiduratath kiya..
